item.title: Review of The Unicorn Project: A Novel about Developers, Digital Distribution, and Thriving in the Digital Age of Data
item.description: The Unicorn Project is written as a quasi-sequel to the widely popular book, The Phoenix Project.

item.title: Review of The Phoenix Project: A Novel about IT, DevOps, and Helping Your Business Win
item.description: I recently finished reading “The Phoenix Project” written by Gene Kim, Kevin Bahr, and George Spafford.
